# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏° ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant 
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Recursive
import random

def determinant(matrix): # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant
    #   ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Recursive
    if len(matrix) == 1: # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ Matrix 1x1
        return matrix[0][0] # ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô
    if len(matrix) == 2: # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ Matrix 2x2
        return matrix[0][0] * matrix[1][1] - matrix[0][1] * matrix[1][0] # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix 2x2

    det = 0 # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Determinant ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô 0
    for c in range(len(matrix)): # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ Matrix 3x3 ‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
        minor = [row[:c] + row[c+1:] for row in matrix[1:]] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Minor Matrix
        det += ((-1) ** c) * matrix[0][c] * determinant(minor) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix 3x3 ‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
    return det # ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ Determinant

print("=" * 80) # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: ")) # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix

# ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞ Matrix ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™
matrix_a = [[random.randint(1, 5) for _ in range(rows)] for _ in range(rows)] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™ ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant
det = determinant(matrix_a) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix A

rows, columns = 3, 3 # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå

matrix_b = [[random.randint(0, 9) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå B

difference = [[matrix_a[i][j] - matrix_b[i][j] for j in range(columns)] for i in range(rows)] # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå A ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ B

# 1. ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏≤ Transpose

    print("Invalid input! Please enter integers only.") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô
    exit()

# ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏ï‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
if rows < 1 or columns < 1:
    print("!!! Number of rows and columns must be at least 1 !!!") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô
    exit()

# ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏î‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
print("Choose an operation:") 
print("1. Generate matrix and transpose")
print("2. Generate matrix and compute determinant (if square matrix)")
choice = input("Enter your choice (1 or 2): ")

if choice == "1": # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å 1
    # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏°‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö Matrix A
    matrix_a = [[random.randint(0, 9) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°
    print(f"Matrix A [{rows}x{columns}]  : {matrix_a}") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á Matrix A

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Transpose
    matrix_a_t = [[matrix_a[j][i] for j in range(rows)] for i in range(columns)]
    print(f"Transpose [{columns}x{rows}]: {matrix_a_t}")

elif choice == "2" and rows == columns:
    # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏°‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö Matrix A (‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô Matrix ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™)
    matrix_a = [[random.randint(1, 9) for _ in range(rows)] for _ in range(rows)] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°
    print(f"Matrix A [{rows}x{rows}]: {matrix_a}") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á Matrix A

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant (‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ 2x2 ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ 3x3)
    if rows == 2: # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ Matrix 2x2
        det = matrix_a[0][0] * matrix_a[1][1] - matrix_a[0][1] * matrix_a[1][0] # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix 2x2
    elif rows == 3: # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ Matrix 3x3
        det = (
            matrix_a[0][0] * (matrix_a[1][1] * matrix_a[2][2] - matrix_a[1][2] * matrix_a[2][1])
            - matrix_a[0][1] * (matrix_a[1][0] * matrix_a[2][2] - matrix_a[1][2] * matrix_a[2][0])
            + matrix_a[0][2] * (matrix_a[1][0] * matrix_a[2][1] - matrix_a[1][1] * matrix_a[2][0])
        )
    else:
        print("Determinant calculation for matrices larger than 3x3 is not implemented.")
        det = None # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ Determinant ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô None

    print(f"Determinant of Matrix A: {det if det is not None else 'Unavailable'}") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ Determinant ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô
else:
    print("Invalid choice or incompatible matrix size for determinant.")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå 2 ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå A ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ B

import random

print("=" * 80)
rows, columns = 3, 3 # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå

# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix A ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ B
matrix_a = [[random.randint(0, 5) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]
matrix_b = [[random.randint(0, 5) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]
print(f"Matrix A: {matrix_a}")
print(f"Matrix B: {matrix_b}")

# ‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏° Matrix
combined = [[matrix_a[i][j] + matrix_b[i][j] for j in range(columns)] for i in range(rows)] # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå A ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ B
print(f"Combined Matrix A+B: {combined}")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix Identity (‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏ì‡πå) ‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏∏
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢ Matrix Identity ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠ Matrix ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç 1 ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡∏ö‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ó‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏á ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç 0 ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏≠‡∏∑‡πà‡∏ô ‡πÜ
import random

def determinant(matrix):
    """‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Recursive"""
    if len(matrix) == 1:
        return matrix[0][0]
    if len(matrix) == 2:
        return matrix[0][0] * matrix[1][1] - matrix[0][1] * matrix[1][0]

    det = 0
    for c in range(len(matrix)):
        minor = [row[:c] + row[c+1:] for row in matrix[1:]]
        det += ((-1) ** c) * matrix[0][c] * determinant(minor)
    return det

print("=" * 80)
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: "))

# ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞ Matrix ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™
matrix_a = [[random.randint(1, 5) for _ in range(rows)] for _ in range(rows)]
print(f"Matrix A [{rows}x{rows}]: {matrix_a}")

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant
det = determinant(matrix_a)
print(f"Determinant: {det}")

# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix Identity
identity_matrix = [[1 if i == j else 0 for j in range(rows)] for i in range(rows)]
print(f"Identity Matrix [{rows}x{rows}]: {identity_matrix}")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏∏ ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
# ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á Transpose ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ó‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏á (‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™)
import random 

print("=" * 80)
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: "))
columns = int(input("Enter a number of columns: "))

if rows > 5 or columns > 5:
    print("Matrix size too large! Try smaller dimensions.")
    exit()

# ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°
min_val = int(input("Enter minimum random value: "))
max_val = int(input("Enter maximum random value: "))

matrix_a = [[random.randint(min_val, max_val) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]
print(f"Matrix A [{rows}x{columns}]: {matrix_a}")

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Transpose
matrix_a_t = [[matrix_a[j][i] for j in range(rows)] for i in range(columns)]
print(f"Transpose [{columns}x{rows}]: {matrix_a_t}")

# ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ Matrix A ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏à‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ó‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏á
if rows == columns:
    diag_sum = sum(matrix_a[i][i] for i in range(rows))
    print(f"Sum of main diagonal elements: {diag_sum}")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå 90 ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏®‡∏≤

import random

print("=" * 80)
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: "))
columns = int(input("Enter a number of columns: "))

matrix_a = [[random.randint(0, 9) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]
print(f"Original Matrix: {matrix_a}")

# ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏ô 90 ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏®‡∏≤
rotated = [[matrix_a[rows-1-j][i] for j in range(rows)] for i in range(columns)]
print(f"Matrix rotated 90 degrees: {rotated}")

det = matrix_a[0][0] * matrix_a[1][1] - matrix_a[0][1] * matrix_a[1][0]

else:

               [-matrix_a[1][0] / det, matrix_a[0][0] / det]]

matrix_a = [[random.randint(0, 20) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]  # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°

    sorted_matrix = [sorted(row) for row in matrix_a] # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏•‡∏≥‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix
    print(f"Matrix sorted by rows: {sorted_matrix}")

# Drawing a reversed right triangle with random letters
import random
import string

while True:
    height = int(input("Enter the height of the triangle (0 to quit): "))
    if height == 0:
        break
    for i in range(1, height + 1):
        spaces = ' ' * (height - i)
        stars = ''.join(random.choice(string.ascii_letters) for _ in range(i))
        print(spaces + stars)
    print()

import random

def generate_secret_number():
    """Generate a 4-digit secret number with unique digits."""
    return random.sample(range(10), 4)

def calculate_hint(secret, guess):
    """Calculate MEN and WOMEN based on the guess."""
    men = sum(s == g for s, g in zip(secret, guess))
    women = sum(g in secret for g in guess) - men
    return men, women

def calculate_score(attempts):
    """Calculate score based on the number of attempts."""
    return max(100 - 10 * (attempts - 1), 0)

        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    if len(user_input) != 4 or not user_input.isdigit():
        print("Invalid input. Please enter a 4-digit number.")
        continue

    guess = list(map(int, user_input))
    if len(set(guess)) != 4:
        print("Digits must be unique. Try again.")

    attempts += 1
    men, women = calculate_hint(secret_number, guess)

# ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏° MEN and WOMEN ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡πÉ‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏®‡∏©‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô 5 ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
import random

def generate_secret_number():
    """Generate a 4-digit secret number with unique digits."""
    return random.sample(range(10), 4)

def calculate_hint(secret, guess):
    """Calculate MEN and WOMEN based on the guess."""
    men = sum(s == g for s, g in zip(secret, guess))
    women = sum(g in secret for g in guess) - men
    return men, women

def special_hint(secret):
    """Generate a special hint showing one digit of the secret."""
    return random.choice(secret)

print("------ Welcome to MEN and WOMEN number guessing game ------")
print("[To exit the program, press 0]")
print("----------------------------------------------------------")

secret_number = generate_secret_number()
attempts = 0

while True:
    user_input = input("Enter 4-digits number: ")

    if user_input == "0":
        print(f"Secret Number was: {''.join(map(str, secret_number))}")
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    if len(user_input) != 4 or not user_input.isdigit():
        print("Invalid input. Please enter a 4-digit number.")
        continue

    guess = list(map(int, user_input))
    if len(set(guess)) != 4:
        print("Digits must be unique. Try again.")
        continue

    attempts += 1
    men, women = calculate_hint(secret_number, guess)

    print(f"Hint: MEN = {men} and WOMEN = {women}")

    if attempts > 5:  # ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡πÉ‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏®‡∏©‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô 5 ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
        special_digit = special_hint(secret_number)
        print(f"Special Hint: One of the digits is {special_digit}")

    if men == 4:
        print(f"*** Congratulations *** Your guess is correct, after {attempts} attempts")
        print(f"Secret Number was: {''.join(map(str, secret_number))}")
        break

# ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏° MEN and WOMEN ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ
import random

def generate_secret_number(unique=True):
    """Generate a 4-digit secret number, optionally allowing duplicate digits."""
    if unique:
        return random.sample(range(10), 4)
    else:
        return [random.randint(0, 9) for _ in range(4)]

def calculate_hint(secret, guess):
    """Calculate MEN and WOMEN based on the guess."""
    men = sum(s == g for s, g in zip(secret, guess))
    women = sum(g in secret for g in guess) - men
    return men, women

print("----------------------------------------------------------")

attempts = 0

while True:
    user_input = input("Enter 4-digits number: ")

    if user_input == "0":
        print(f"Secret Number was: {''.join(map(str, secret_number))}")
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    if len(user_input) != 4 or not user_input.isdigit():
        print("Invalid input. Please enter a 4-digit number.")
        continue

    guess = list(map(int, user_input))
    if not allow_duplicates and len(set(guess)) != 4:
        print("Digits must be unique. Try again.")
        continue

    attempts += 1
    men, women = calculate_hint(secret_number, guess)

    print(f"Hint: MEN = {men} and WOMEN = {women}")

    if men == 4:
        print(f"*** Congratulations *** Your guess is correct, after {attempts} attempts")
        print(f"Secret Number was: {''.join(map(str, secret_number))}")
        break

#Bull Cow Game Clone
import random

def generate_secret_number(): #Generate a 4-digit secret number with unique digits.
    
    return random.sample(range(10), 4) 

def calculate_hint(secret, guess): #Calculate MEN and WOMEN based on the guess.
    men = sum(s == g for s, g in zip(secret, guess))
    women = sum(g in secret for g in guess) - men
    return men, women

# Main program
print("------ Welcome to MEN and WOMEN number guessing game ------")
print("[To exit the program, press 0]")
print("----------------------------------------------------------")

# Generate the secret number and display it
secret_number = generate_secret_number()
print(f"Secret Number (for debugging): {''.join(map(str, secret_number))}")

attempts = 0

while True:
    user_input = input("Enter 4-digits number: ")

    if user_input == "0":
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    if len(user_input) != 4 or not user_input.isdigit():
        print("Invalid input. Please enter a 4-digit number.")
        continue

    guess = list(map(int, user_input))
    if len(set(guess)) != 4:
        print("Digits must be unique. Try again.")
        continue

    attempts += 1
    men, women = calculate_hint(secret_number, guess)

    print(f"Hint: MEN = {men} and WOMEN = {women}")

    if men == 4:
        print(f"*** Congratulations *** Your guess is correct, after {attempts} times")
        break

import random

def generate_secret_number():
    """Generate a 4-digit secret number with unique digits."""
    return random.sample(range(10), 4)

def calculate_hint(secret, guess):
    """Calculate MEN and WOMEN based on the guess."""
    men = sum(s == g for s, g in zip(secret, guess))
    women = sum(g in secret for g in guess) - men
    return men, women

# Main program
print("------ Welcome to MEN and WOMEN number guessing game ------")
print("[To exit the program, press 0]")
print("----------------------------------------------------------")

# Generate the secret number
secret_number = generate_secret_number()

attempts = 0

while True:
    user_input = input("Enter 4-digits number: ")

    if user_input == "0":
        print(f"Secret Number was: {''.join(map(str, secret_number))}")
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    if len(user_input) != 4 or not user_input.isdigit():
        print("Invalid input. Please enter a 4-digit number.")
        continue

    guess = list(map(int, user_input))
    if len(set(guess)) != 4:
        print("Digits must be unique. Try again.")
        continue

    attempts += 1
    men, women = calculate_hint(secret_number, guess)

    print(f"Hint: MEN = {men} and WOMEN = {women}")

    if men == 4:
        print(f"*** Congratulations *** Your guess is correct, after {attempts} times")
        print(f"Secret Number was: {''.join(map(str, secret_number))}")
        break

# Program to calculate change when multiple people pay together
def calculate_change(total_price, payments):
    denominations = {
        "The 500-$Baht Banknote": 500,
        "The 100-$Baht Banknote": 100,
        "The 50-$Baht Banknote": 50,
        "The 20-$Baht Banknote": 20,
        "The 10-$Baht Coin": 10,
        "The 5-$Baht Coin": 5,
        "The 2-$Baht Coin": 2,
        "The 1-$Baht Coin": 1,
    }

    total_payment = sum(payments)
    change = total_payment - total_price

    if change < 0:
        return "!!! Insufficient payment !!!"
    elif change == 0:
        return "Complete payment"
    else:
        result = []
        for denom, value in denominations.items():
            count = change // value
            if count > 0:
                result.append(f"{denom} = {count} Piece(s)")
            change %= value
        return "\n".join(result)

while True:
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")
    total_price = int(input("The total price of products: "))
    num_people = int(input("Enter the number of people paying: "))
    payments = [int(input(f"Payment from person {i + 1}: ")) for i in range(num_people)]
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")

    if sum(payments) == 0:
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    result = calculate_change(total_price, payments)
    print(result)
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")

# Program to display the number of steps needed for making change
def calculate_change_steps(total_price, payment):
    denominations = {
        "The 500-$Baht Banknote": 500,
        "The 100-$Baht Banknote": 100,
        "The 50-$Baht Banknote": 50,
        "The 20-$Baht Banknote": 20,
        "The 10-$Baht Coin": 10,
        "The 5-$Baht Coin": 5,
        "The 2-$Baht Coin": 2,
        "The 1-$Baht Coin": 1,
    }

    change = payment - total_price
    steps = 0  # ‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≠‡∏ô

    if change < 0:
        return "!!! Incorrect payment !!!"
    elif change == 0:
        return "Complete payment"
    else:
        result = []
        for denom, value in denominations.items():
            count = change // value
            if count > 0:
                steps += count
                result.append(f"{denom} = {count} Piece(s)")
            change %= value
        result.append(f"Total steps needed: {steps}")
        return "\n".join(result)

while True:
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")
    total_price = int(input("The total price of products: "))
    payment = int(input("Customer payment: "))
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")

    if payment == 0:
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    result = calculate_change_steps(total_price, payment)
    print(result)
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")

# Program to calculate change with options for USD denominations
def calculate_change(total_price, payment, currency="THB"):
    denominations = {
        "THB": {
            "The 500-$Baht Banknote": 500,
            "The 100-$Baht Banknote": 100,
            "The 50-$Baht Banknote": 50,
            "The 20-$Baht Banknote": 20,
            "The 10-$Baht Coin": 10,
            "The 5-$Baht Coin": 5,
            "The 2-$Baht Coin": 2,
            "The 1-$Baht Coin": 1,
        },
        "USD": {
            "The 100-$Bill": 100,
            "The 50-$Bill": 50,
            "The 20-$Bill": 20,
            "The 10-$Bill": 10,
            "The 5-$Bill": 5,
            "The 1-$Bill": 1,
            "The 25c-Coin": 0.25,
            "The 10c-Coin": 0.10,
            "The 5c-Coin": 0.05,
            "The 1c-Coin": 0.01,
        },
    }

    if currency not in denominations:
        return "Unsupported currency!"

    change = payment - total_price
    if change < 0:
        return "!!! Incorrect payment !!!"
    elif change == 0:
        return "Complete payment"
    else:
        result = []
        for denom, value in denominations[currency].items():
            count = int(change // value)
            if count > 0:
                unit = "Piece(s)" if "Coin" in denom or "c" in denom else "Note(s)"
                result.append(f"{denom} = {count} {unit}")
            change %= value
        return "\n".join(result)

while True:
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")
    currency = input("Enter currency (THB/USD): ").strip().upper()
    total_price = float(input("The total price of products: "))
    payment = float(input("Customer payment: "))
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")
    
    if payment == 0:
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    result = calculate_change(total_price, payment, currency)
    print(result)
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")

# Program to calculate change with Thai Satang units
def calculate_change(total_price, payment):
    denominations = {
        "The 500-$Baht Banknote": 500,
        "The 100-$Baht Banknote": 100,
        "The 50-$Baht Banknote": 50,
        "The 20-$Baht Banknote": 20,
        "The 10-$Baht Coin": 10,
        "The 5-$Baht Coin": 5,
        "The 2-$Baht Coin": 2,
        "The 1-$Baht Coin": 1,
        "The 50-Satang Coin": 0.5,
        "The 25-Satang Coin": 0.25,
    }

    change = payment - total_price
    if change < 0:
        return "!!! Incorrect payment !!!"
    elif change == 0:
        return "Complete payment"
    else:
        result = []
        for denom, value in denominations.items():
            count = int(change // value)
            if count > 0:
                unit = "Piece(s)"
                result.append(f"{denom} = {count} {unit}")
            change = round(change % value, 2)
        return "\n".join(result)

    payment = float(input("Customer payment (THB): "))

        print("Exiting the program.")

# Program to calculate change excluding specific denominations
def calculate_change_exclude(total_price, payment, excluded_units):
    denominations = {
        "The 500-$Baht Banknote": 500,
        "The 100-$Baht Banknote": 100,
        "The 50-$Baht Banknote": 50,
        "The 20-$Baht Banknote": 20,
        "The 10-$Baht Coin": 10,
        "The 5-$Baht Coin": 5,
        "The 2-$Baht Coin": 2,
        "The 1-$Baht Coin": 1,
    }

    # Remove excluded denominations
    denominations = {k: v for k, v in denominations.items() if v not in excluded_units}

    change = payment - total_price
    if change < 0:
        return "!!! Incorrect payment !!!"
    elif change == 0:
        return "Complete payment"
    else:
        result = []
        for denom, value in denominations.items():
            count = change // value
            if count > 0:
                result.append(f"{denom} = {count} Piece(s)")
            change %= value
        if change > 0:  # Remaining change that can't be returned
            result.append(f"Remaining unreturnable amount: {change} Baht")
        return "\n".join(result)

while True:
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")
    excluded_units = list(map(int, input("Enter excluded units (e.g., 1,2): ").split(",")))
    total_price = int(input("The total price of products: "))
    payment = int(input("Customer payment: "))
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")

    if payment == 0:
        print("Exiting the program.")
        break

    result = calculate_change_exclude(total_price, payment, excluded_units)
    print(result)
    print("----------------------------------------------------------")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ secret key ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ secret key ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á
import random
import string

def generate_random_key(length):
    """‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°"""
    return ''.join(random.choices(string.ascii_letters + string.digits + string.punctuation, k=length))

def adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö Plaintext"""
    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):
        return secret_key[:len(plaintext)]
    else:
        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1
        return (secret_key * repeat_times)[:len(plaintext)]

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))
    return ciphertext

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    plaintext = ''.join(chr(ord(c) ^ ord(k)) for c, k in zip(ciphertext, secret_key))
    return plaintext

# Main Program

def check_key_strength(secret_key):
    """‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key"""
    if len(secret_key) < 8:
        return "Weak: The key is too short. Use at least 8 characters."
    if secret_key.isalpha() or secret_key.isdigit():
        return "Weak: The key should contain a mix of letters, digits, and symbols."
    return "Strong: The key is secure."

def adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö Plaintext"""
    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):
        return secret_key[:len(plaintext)]
    else:
        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1
        return (secret_key * repeat_times)[:len(plaintext)]

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))
    return ciphertext

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    plaintext = ''.join(chr(ord(c) ^ ord(k)) for c, k in zip(ciphertext, secret_key))
    return plaintext

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ Checksum
import hashlib

def calculate_checksum(data):
    """‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Checksum ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°"""
    return hashlib.sha256(data.encode()).hexdigest()

def adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö Plaintext"""
    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):
        return secret_key[:len(plaintext)]
    else:
        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1
        return (secret_key * repeat_times)[:len(plaintext)]

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))
    checksum = calculate_checksum(ciphertext)  # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Checksum
    return ciphertext, checksum

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key, original_checksum):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö Checksum"""
    plaintext = ''.join(chr(ord(c) ^ ord(k)) for c, k in zip(ciphertext, secret_key))
    checksum = calculate_checksum(ciphertext)  # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö Checksum
    if checksum != original_checksum:
        return plaintext, "Warning: The ciphertext might have been tampered!"
    return plaintext, "Checksum matched. Data integrity verified."

# Main Program
print("------------- Encryption and Decryption Program with Checksum -------------")

print(f"Checksum: {checksum}")

print(f"Verification: {verification_message}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ XOR ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏à‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏±‡∏• (Digital Fingerprint)
import hashlib

def generate_fingerprint(data):
    """‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏à‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏±‡∏• (Digital Fingerprint)"""
    return hashlib.md5(data.encode()).hexdigest()

def adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö Plaintext"""
    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):
        return secret_key[:len(plaintext)]
    else:
        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1
        return (secret_key * repeat_times)[:len(plaintext)]

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))
    fingerprint = generate_fingerprint(ciphertext)  # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠
    return ciphertext, fingerprint

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key, original_fingerprint):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠"""
    plaintext = ''.join(chr(ord(c) ^ ord(k)) for c, k in zip(ciphertext, secret_key))
    fingerprint = generate_fingerprint(ciphertext)
    if fingerprint != original_fingerprint:
        return plaintext, "Warning: Data might have been altered!"
    return plaintext, "Data integrity verified."

# Main Program
print("------------- Encryption and Decryption Program with Digital Fingerprint -------------")

plaintext = input("Enter your plaintext: ")
secret_key = input("Enter your secret key: ")

adjusted_key = adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key)
ciphertext, fingerprint = encrypt(plaintext, adjusted_key)

print(f"Digital Fingerprint: {fingerprint}")

decrypted_text, verification_message = decrypt(ciphertext, adjusted_key, fingerprint)
print(f"The decryption results: {decrypted_text}")
print(f"Verification: {verification_message}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR
def save_to_file(filename, content):
    """‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå"""
    with open(filename, "w") as file:
        file.write(content)

def read_from_file(filename):
    """‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå"""
    with open(filename, "r") as file:
        return file.read()

def adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö Plaintext"""
    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):
        return secret_key[:len(plaintext)]
    else:
        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1
        return (secret_key * repeat_times)[:len(plaintext)]

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))
    return ciphertext

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    plaintext = ''.join(chr(ord(c) ^ ord(k)) for c, k in zip(ciphertext, secret_key))
    return plaintext

# Main Program
print("------------- Encryption and Decryption Program -------------")

plaintext = input("Enter your plaintext: ")
secret_key = input("Enter your secret key: ")

adjusted_key = adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key)
ciphertext = encrypt(plaintext, adjusted_key)

ciphertext_from_file = read_from_file(filename)  # ‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô Ciphertext ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå
decrypted_text = decrypt(ciphertext_from_file, adjusted_key)
print(f"The decryption results: {decrypted_text}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Base64 ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™ ciphertext
import base64

def encode_base64(data):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™ Base64"""
    return base64.b64encode(data.encode()).decode()

def decode_base64(data):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™ Base64"""
    return base64.b64decode(data.encode()).decode()

def adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö Plaintext"""
    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):
        return secret_key[:len(plaintext)]
    else:
        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1
        return (secret_key * repeat_times)[:len(plaintext)]

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))
    return ciphertext

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""
    plaintext = ''.join(chr(ord(c) ^ ord(k)) for c, k in zip(ciphertext, secret_key))
    return plaintext

# Main Program
print("------------- Encryption and Decryption Program -------------")

plaintext = input("Enter your plaintext: ")
secret_key = input("Enter your secret key: ")

adjusted_key = adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key)
ciphertext = encrypt(plaintext, adjusted_key)

encoded_ciphertext = encode_base64(ciphertext)  # ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™ Base64
print(f"Ciphertext (Base64): {encoded_ciphertext}")

decoded_ciphertext = decode_base64(encoded_ciphertext)  # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™ Base64
decrypted_text = decrypt(decoded_ciphertext, adjusted_key)
print(f"The decryption results: {decrypted_text}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ä‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô
def adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key):
    """‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Secret Key ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö Plaintext"""
    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):
        return secret_key[:len(plaintext)]
    else:
        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1
        return (secret_key * repeat_times)[:len(plaintext)]

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key, layers=2):
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ä‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô"""
    ciphertext = plaintext
    for _ in range(layers):
        ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(ciphertext, secret_key))
    return ciphertext

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key, layers=2):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ä‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô"""
    plaintext = ciphertext
    for _ in range(layers):
        plaintext = ''.join(chr(ord(c) ^ ord(k)) for c, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))
    return plaintext

# Main Program
print("------------- Multi-layer Encryption and Decryption Program -------------")

plaintext = input("Enter your plaintext: ")
secret_key = input("Enter your secret key: ")
layers = int(input("Enter the number of encryption layers: "))

adjusted_key = adjust_key_length(plaintext, secret_key)
ciphertext = encrypt(plaintext, adjusted_key, layers)
print(f"The encrypted ciphertext after {layers} layers: {ciphertext}")

decrypted_text = decrypt(ciphertext, adjusted_key, layers)
print(f"The decryption results: {decrypted_text}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR

    if len(secret_key) > len(plaintext):

        repeat_times = len(plaintext) // len(secret_key) + 1

def encrypt(plaintext, secret_key):

    ciphertext = ''.join(chr(ord(p) ^ ord(k)) for p, k in zip(plaintext, secret_key))

def decrypt(ciphertext, secret_key):
    """‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ XOR"""

import math

# ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ä‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö

# ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ä‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö

for subject in valid_subjects:
    max_score = -1
    min_score = 101
    top_student = ""
    low_student = ""

    for student_id, scores in Info_Dict.items():
        score = scores[subject]
        if score > max_score:
            max_score = score

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix ‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î 2x2
import random

print("=" * 80)
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: "))

if rows != 2 or columns != 2:

else:
    print("=" * 80)
    # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏° 0-9 ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö Matrix A

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Eigenvalues ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix ‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î 2x2
import random
import math

print("=" * 80)
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: "))
columns = int(input("Enter a number of columns: "))

if rows != 2 or columns != 2:
    print("!!! Error: Eigenvalue calculation only supports 2x2 matrices !!!\n")
else:
    matrix = [[random.randint(0, 9) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]
    print(f"Matrix: {matrix}")

    a, b = matrix[0][0], matrix[0][1]
    c, d = matrix[1][0], matrix[1][1]

    trace = a + d
    determinant = a * d - b * c

    eigenvalue1 = (trace + math.sqrt(trace**2 - 4 * determinant)) / 2
    eigenvalue2 = (trace - math.sqrt(trace**2 - 4 * determinant)) / 2

    print(f"Eigenvalues: {eigenvalue1:.2f}, {eigenvalue2:.2f}")
    print("=" * 80 + "\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô ‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á matrix ‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î rows x columns ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á 0-9 ‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á matrix ‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ matrix ‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Inverse Matrix ‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î 2x2
import random

print("=" * 80)
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: "))
columns = int(input("Enter a number of columns: "))

if rows != 2 or columns != 2:
    print("!!! Error: Inverse calculation only supports 2x2 matrices !!!\n")
else:
    print("=" * 80)
    # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏° 1-9 ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö Matrix A (‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏á determinant = 0)
    matrix_a = [[random.randint(1, 9) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]
    print(f"Matrix A [{rows}x{columns}]: {matrix_a}")

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant
    determinant = matrix_a[0][0] * matrix_a[1][1] - matrix_a[0][1] * matrix_a[1][0]
    if determinant == 0:
        print("!!! Error: Matrix is not invertible (Determinant = 0) !!!")
    else:
        # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Inverse Matrix
        inverse_matrix = [
            [matrix_a[1][1] / determinant, -matrix_a[0][1] / determinant],
            [-matrix_a[1][0] / determinant, matrix_a[0][0] / determinant],
        ]
        print(f"Inverse of Matrix A: {inverse_matrix}")
    print("=" * 80 + "\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏•‡∏ö Matrix ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô 3x3

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Identity Matrix
print("=" * 80)

if size > 3:  # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î

#‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Matrix ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡∏ì A x A^T

import random

print("=" * 80)
rows = int(input("Enter a number of rows: "))
columns = int(input("Enter a number of columns: "))

if rows > 3 or columns > 3:
    print("!!!   Error in a number of rows or columns   !!!\n")
else:
    print("=" * 80)
    # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏° 0-9 ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö Matrix A
    matrix_a = [[random.randint(0, 9) for _ in range(columns)] for _ in range(rows)]
    
    print(f"Matrix A [{rows}x{columns}] with a python LIST structure  : {matrix_a}")
    
    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Transpose ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Matrix A
    matrix_a_t = [[matrix_a[j][i] for j in range(rows)] for i in range(columns)]
    print(f"Its transpose [{columns}x{rows}]                          : {matrix_a_t}")
    print("=" * 80)

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡∏ì A x A^T
    result = [[sum(matrix_a[i][k] * matrix_a_t[k][j] for k in range(columns)) for j in range(rows)] for i in range(rows)]

    print("Calculation details for a multiplication of a matrix A and its transpose\n")
    for i in range(rows):
        row_details = []
        for j in range(rows):
            # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì
            detail = "+".join(
                f"({matrix_a[i][k]}x{matrix_a_t[k][j]})" for k in range(columns)
            )
            total = sum(matrix_a[i][k] * matrix_a_t[k][j] for k in range(columns))
            row_details.append(f"{detail} = {total:<3}")
        print("    ".join(row_details))  # ‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏≠‡∏•‡∏±‡∏°‡∏ô‡πå‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°
    
    print("\nMultiplication result [{}x{}]                  : {}".format(rows, rows, result))
    print("=" * 80 + "\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏° ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏° ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏¢ ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î
import math

#‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î
def Area_Of_Triangle(b, h):
    aot = 0.5 * b * h
    return f"The area is {aot:.2f}"

def Area_Of_Rectangle(l, w):
    aor = l * w
    return f"The area is {aor:.2f}"

def The_Long_Side_Of_The_Right_Triangle(a1, b1):
    longside = math.sqrt(a1**2 + b1**2)
    return f"The length of the longest size is {longside:.2f}"

def The_Solution_Of_Quadratic_Formula(c2, b2, a2):
    if a2 == 0:
        return "‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ a ‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö 0"

    discriminant = b2**2 - 4 * a2 * c2

    if discriminant < 0:
        # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏•‡∏ö ‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏¥‡∏á‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô
        root1 = (-b2 + complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a2)
        root2 = (-b2 - complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a2)
        return f"The 1st solution is x = {root1}\nThe 2nd solution is x = {root2}"
    elif discriminant == 0:
        x1 = -b2 / (2 * a2)
        x2 = -b2 / (2 * a2)
        return f"The 1st solution is x = {x1}\nThe 2nd solution is x = {x2}"
    else:
        x1 = (-b2 + math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a2)
        x2 = (-b2 - math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a2)
        return f"The 1st solution is x = {x1}\nThe 2nd solution is x = {x2}"

def Distance_Of_Two_Points(x1, y1, x2, y2):
    dtp = math.sqrt((x2 - x1)**2 + (y2 - y1)**2)
    return f"The distance between the two points is {dtp:.2f}"

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏° ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà ‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏ú‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏ú‡πâ‡∏≤ ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏∂‡πà‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
import math

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
def triangle_area_and_perimeter(base, height, side1, side2):
    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
    area = 0.5 * base * height
    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
    perimeter = base + side1 + side2
    return f"Area = {area:.2f}, Perimeter = {perimeter:.2f}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà ‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏ú‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏ú‡πâ‡∏≤
def rectangle_calculations(length, width):
    # ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà
    area = length * width
    # ‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ
    perimeter = 2 * (length + width)
    # ‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏° (‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏§‡∏©‡∏é‡∏µ‡∏õ‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡πÇ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏±‡∏™)
    diagonal = math.sqrt(length**2 + width**2)
    return f"Area = {area:.2f}, Perimeter = {perimeter:.2f}, Diagonal = {diagonal:.2f}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏∂‡πà‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î
def distance_and_midpoint(x1, y1, x2, y2):
    # ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î
    distance = math.sqrt((x2 - x1)**2 + (y2 - y1)**2)
    # ‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏∂‡πà‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á
    midpoint = ((x1 + x2) / 2, (y1 + y2) / 2)
    return f"Distance = {distance:.2f}, Midpoint = {midpoint}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏†‡∏ó‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏Å
def solve_quadratic(a, b, c):
    if a == 0:
        return "Coefficient 'a' must not be zero."

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Discriminant
    discriminant = b**2 - 4 * a * c

    if discriminant > 0:
        root1 = (-b + math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a)
        root2 = (-b - math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a)
        root_type = "Real and Distinct"
    elif discriminant == 0:
        root1 = root2 = -b / (2 * a)
        root_type = "Real and Equal"
    else:
        root1 = (-b + complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a)
        root2 = (-b - complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a)
        root_type = "Complex"
    
    return f"Roots: {root1}, {root2} (Type: {root_type})"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏π‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°
def main():
    while True:
        # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏π‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å
        print("\n=== Math Calculations Menu ===")
        print("1. Triangle Area and Perimeter")
        print("2. Rectangle Area, Perimeter, and Diagonal")
        print("3. Distance and Midpoint Between Two Points")
        print("4. Solve Quadratic Equation")
        print("5. Exit")
        
        choice = input("Enter your choice (1-5): ")

        if choice == '1':
            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
            base = float(input("Enter the base of the triangle: "))
            height = float(input("Enter the height of the triangle: "))
            side1 = float(input("Enter the first side of the triangle: "))
            side2 = float(input("Enter the second side of the triangle: "))
            print(triangle_area_and_perimeter(base, height, side1, side2))

        elif choice == '2':
            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏ú‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏ú‡πâ‡∏≤
            length = float(input("Enter the length of the rectangle: "))
            width = float(input("Enter the width of the rectangle: "))
            print(rectangle_calculations(length, width))

        elif choice == '3':
            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î
            x1 = float(input("Enter x1: "))
            y1 = float(input("Enter y1: "))
            x2 = float(input("Enter x2: "))
            y2 = float(input("Enter y2: "))
            print(distance_and_midpoint(x1, y1, x2, y2))

        elif choice == '4':
            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
            a = float(input("Enter coefficient a: "))
            b = float(input("Enter coefficient b: "))
            c = float(input("Enter constant c: "))
            print(solve_quadratic(a, b, c))

        elif choice == '5':
            print("Exiting the program. Goodbye!")
            break

        else:
            print("Invalid choice. Please try again.")

# ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å
if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏°, ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô 3 ‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏¥, ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î, ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
import math
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏°
def circle_and_sphere_calculations(radius):
    if radius <= 0:
        return "Radius must be greater than 0."
    # ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏°
    circle_area = math.pi * radius**2
    # ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏°
    sphere_volume = (4/3) * math.pi * radius**3
    return f"Circle Area = {circle_area:.2f}, Sphere Volume = {sphere_volume:.2f}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô 3 ‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏¥
def distance_3d(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2):
    # ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô 3 ‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏¥
    distance = math.sqrt((x2 - x1)**2 + (y2 - y1)**2 + (z2 - z1)**2)
    return f"Distance in 3D = {distance:.2f}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î
def slope(x1, y1, x2, y2):
    if x2 - x1 == 0:
        return "Slope is undefined (vertical line)."
    slope_value = (y2 - y1) / (x2 - x1)
    return f"Slope = {slope_value:.2f}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
def plot_quadratic(a, b, c):
    if a == 0:
        return "Coefficient 'a' must not be zero."
    # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á x ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü
    x = [i / 10 for i in range(-100, 101)]  # -10 ‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á 10 (‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏î)
    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ y ‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ ax^2 + bx + c
    y = [a*i**2 + b*i + c for i in x]
    # ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü
    plt.plot(x, y, label=f"{a}x¬≤ + {b}x + {c}")
    plt.axhline(0, color='black', linewidth=0.5)  # ‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏ô x
    plt.axvline(0, color='black', linewidth=0.5)  # ‡πÄ‡∏™‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏ô y
    plt.title("Graph of Quadratic Equation")
    plt.xlabel("x-axis")
    plt.ylabel("y-axis")
    plt.legend()
    plt.grid(True)
    plt.show()
    return "Graph plotted successfully."

# ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏π‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°

        try:

            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏±‡∏®‡∏°‡∏µ
            try:

        elif choice == 2:
            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô 3 ‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏¥
            try:
                x1 = float(input("Enter x1: "))
                y1 = float(input("Enter y1: "))
                z1 = float(input("Enter z1: "))
                x2 = float(input("Enter x2: "))

                print(distance_3d(x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2))
            except ValueError:

        elif choice == 3:
            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á
            try:
                x1 = float(input("Enter x1: "))

                x2 = float(input("Enter x2: "))

        elif choice == 4:
            # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
            try:
                a = float(input("Enter coefficient a: "))
                b = float(input("Enter coefficient b: "))

                print("Invalid input. Please enter numeric values.")

        elif choice == 5:

            break

        else:
            print("Invalid choice. Please select a number between 1 and 5.")

if __name__ == "__main__":

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏Ç‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡∏ì‡∏¥‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ
import math

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏° ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ä‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•
def Area_Of_Triangle(*dimensions):
    results = []
    for b, h in dimensions:
        if b <= 0 or h <= 0:
            results.append("Base and Height must be positive numbers.")
        else:
            aot = 0.5 * b * h
            results.append(f"Base = {b}, Height = {h}, Area = {aot:.2f}")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏° ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
def Area_Of_Rectangle(*pairs):
    results = []
    for l, w in pairs:
        if l <= 0 or w <= 0:
            results.append("Length and Width must be positive numbers.")
        else:
            aor = l * w
            results.append(f"Length = {l}, Width = {w}, Area = {aor:.2f}")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö
def The_Long_Side_Of_The_Right_Triangle(a1, b1):
    if a1 <= 0 or b1 <= 0:
        return "Both sides must be positive numbers."
    longside = math.sqrt(a1**2 + b1**2)
    return f"The longest side is {longside:.2f}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
def The_Solution_Of_Quadratic_Formula(*coefficients):
    results = []
    for c2, b2, a2 in coefficients:
        if a2 == 0:
            results.append("Coefficient 'a' must not be zero.")
            continue

        discriminant = b2**2 - 4 * a2 * c2
        if discriminant < 0:
            root1 = (-b2 + complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a2)
            root2 = (-b2 - complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a2)
            results.append(f"a={a2}, b={b2}, c={c2}, Solutions: x1={root1}, x2={root2}")
        elif discriminant == 0:
            x1 = -b2 / (2 * a2)
            results.append(f"a={a2}, b={b2}, c={c2}, Single solution: x={x1}")
        else:
            x1 = (-b2 + math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a2)
            x2 = (-b2 - math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a2)
            results.append(f"a={a2}, b={b2}, c={c2}, Solutions: x1={x1:.2f}, x2={x2:.2f}")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô 2D ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ 3D
def Distance_Between_Points(p1, p2):
    if len(p1) != len(p2):
        return "Points must have the same dimensions."
    distance = math.sqrt(sum((p2[i] - p1[i])**2 for i in range(len(p1))))
    return f"The distance between points {p1} and {p2} is {distance:.2f}"

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢
def display_results(title, results):
    print(f"\n{'-'*50}\n{title}\n{'-'*50}")
    for result in results:
        print(result)

# ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°
def main():
    print("Welcome to the Advanced Geometry Calculator!")
    
    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
    triangles = [(3, 4), (5, 10), (7, -2)]  # ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤
    display_results("Area Of Triangle", Area_Of_Triangle(*triangles))

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
    rectangles = [(4, 5), (3, 7), (-2, 5)]  # ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤
    display_results("Area Of Rectangle", Area_Of_Rectangle(*rectangles))

    # ‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å
    print("\nFinding the longest side of a right triangle:")
    print(The_Long_Side_Of_The_Right_Triangle(3, 4))

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
    quadratics = [(1, -3, 2), (1, 2, 1), (1, 0, -4)]  # ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
    display_results("Solutions Of Quadratic Formula", The_Solution_Of_Quadratic_Formula(*quadratics))

    # ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô 2D ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ 3D
    print("\nCalculating distances:")
    print(Distance_Between_Points((1, 2), (4, 6)))  # 2D
    print(Distance_Between_Points((1, 2, 3), (4, 6, 8)))  # 3D

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°, ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°, ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å, ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á, ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î
import math

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÜ (‡∏û‡∏µ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏î, ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ã‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô)
def Area_Of_Triangle(*dimensions):
    results = []
    for dimension in dimensions:
        if isinstance(dimension, tuple) and len(dimension) == 2:  # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô tuple 2 ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ (‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô, ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á)
            b, h = dimension
            if b <= 0 or h <= 0:
                results.append(f"Invalid dimensions for base {b} and height {h}. Both must be positive numbers.")
            else:
                area = 0.5 * b * h
                results.append(f"Base = {b}, Height = {h}, Area = {area:.2f}")
        elif isinstance(dimension, tuple) and len(dimension) == 3:  # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°
            a, b, c = dimension
            if a <= 0 or b <= 0 or c <= 0:
                results.append(f"Invalid dimensions for sides {a}, {b}, {c}. All sides must be positive numbers.")
            else:
                semi_perimeter = (a + b + c) / 2
                area = math.sqrt(semi_perimeter * (semi_perimeter - a) * (semi_perimeter - b) * (semi_perimeter - c))
                results.append(f"Sides = ({a}, {b}, {c}), Area = {area:.2f}")
        else:
            results.append(f"Invalid input: {dimension}. Expected a tuple of two or three values.")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÜ
def Area_Of_Rectangle(*dimensions):
    results = []
    for dimension in dimensions:
        if isinstance(dimension, tuple) and len(dimension) == 2:  # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô tuple 2 ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ (‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß, ‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á)
            l, w = dimension
            if l <= 0 or w <= 0:
                results.append(f"Invalid dimensions for length {l} and width {w}. Both must be positive numbers.")
            else:
                area = l * w
                results.append(f"Length = {l}, Width = {w}, Area = {area:.2f}")
        else:
            results.append(f"Invalid input: {dimension}. Expected a tuple of two values.")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á
def The_Long_Side_Of_The_Right_Triangle(*sides):
    results = []
    for side in sides:
        if len(side) != 2:
            results.append(f"Invalid input: {side}. Expected a tuple of two sides.")
            continue
        a, b = side
        if a <= 0 or b <= 0:
            results.append(f"Both sides must be positive numbers: {a}, {b}")
        else:
            longside = math.sqrt(a**2 + b**2)
            results.append(f"Sides = ({a}, {b}), Longest side = {longside:.2f}")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
def The_Solution_Of_Quadratic_Formula(*equations):
    results = []
    for a2, b2, c2 in equations:
        if a2 == 0:
            results.append(f"Invalid equation for a = 0: {a2}, b = {b2}, c = {c2}. 'a' must be non-zero.")
            continue

        discriminant = b2**2 - 4 * a2 * c2
        if discriminant < 0:
            root1 = (-b2 + complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a2)
            root2 = (-b2 - complex(0, math.sqrt(-discriminant))) / (2 * a2)
            results.append(f"Equation: a = {a2}, b = {b2}, c = {c2}, Solutions: x1 = {root1}, x2 = {root2}")
        elif discriminant == 0:
            x = -b2 / (2 * a2)
            results.append(f"Equation: a = {a2}, b = {b2}, c = {c2}, Single solution: x = {x:.2f}")
        else:
            x1 = (-b2 + math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a2)
            x2 = (-b2 - math.sqrt(discriminant)) / (2 * a2)
            results.append(f"Equation: a = {a2}, b = {b2}, c = {c2}, Solutions: x1 = {x1:.2f}, x2 = {x2:.2f}")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö 2D ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ 3D
def Distance_Between_Points(*points):
    results = []
    for p1, p2 in points:
        if len(p1) != len(p2):
            results.append(f"Points must have the same dimension: {p1} and {p2}")
            continue
        distance = math.sqrt(sum((p2[i] - p1[i])**2 for i in range(len(p1))))
        results.append(f"Distance between points {p1} and {p2} is {distance:.2f}")
    return results

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÜ
def display_results(title, results):
    print(f"\n{'-'*50}\n{title}\n{'-'*50}")
    for result in results:
        print(result)

    print("Welcome to the Advanced Geometry Calculator!")
    
    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
    triangles = [(3, 4), (5, 12, 13), (6, 8)]  # ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å
    display_results("Area Of Triangle", Area_Of_Triangle(*triangles))

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
    rectangles = [(4, 5), (7, 10)]  # ‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°
    display_results("Area Of Rectangle", Area_Of_Rectangle(*rectangles))

    # ‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å
    right_triangles = [(3, 4), (5, 12)]  # ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏°‡∏â‡∏≤‡∏Å
    display_results("Longest Side of Right Triangle", The_Long_Side_Of_The_Right_Triangle(*right_triangles))

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
    quadratics = [(1, -3, 2), (1, 2, 1), (1, -2, 5)]  # ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á
    display_results("Quadratic Solutions", The_Solution_Of_Quadratic_Formula(*quadratics))

    # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô 2D ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ 3D
    points = [((1, 2), (4, 6)), ((1, 2, 3), (4, 5, 6))]  # ‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô 2D ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ 3D
    display_results("Distance Between Points", Distance_Between_Points(*points))

while True:
    size = int(input("Please enter the size (at least 3): "))
    thickness = int(input("Please enter the frame thickness: "))

    if size == 0 or thickness == 0:
        break
    elif size >= 3 and thickness < size // 2:
        for i in range(size):
            if i < thickness or i >= size - thickness:  # ‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ô/‡∏•‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
                print("#" * size)
            else:  # ‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á
                print("#" * thickness + " " * (size - 2 * thickness) + "#" * thickness)
    else:
        print("Invalid input. Please enter valid size and thickness.")

# ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏™‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏•‡∏ß‡∏î‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏ß‡πâ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ô

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á 2 ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô
#‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏≥‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡∏î‡∏π‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏á‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô process_strings() ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î 
# ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ô‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ dictionary ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á ‡πÜ
def process_strings(a, b):
    # ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á String ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ã‡πá‡∏ï
    set_a = set(a)
    set_b = set(b)

    # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô dictionary
    result = {
        "Unique in A": len(set_a),
        "Unique in B": len(set_b),
        "Common characters": set_a & set_b,
        "A not in B": set_a - set_b,
        "B not in A": set_b - set_a,
        "Symmetric difference": set_a ^ set_b,
        "Union": set_a | set_b
    }
    return result

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏∏‡∏ç‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
user_a = input('Please enter the string A (can include numbers): ')
user_b = input('Please enter the string B (can include numbers): ')

# ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô
output = process_strings(user_a, user_b)

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏£‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ö

# ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡∏•‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå (‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå .txt) ‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏ö‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≠

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ

A = ((1, 3, 5), (2, 4, 6))

    (sum(A[0][k] * A_T[k][0] for k in range(3)), sum(A[0][k] * A_T[k][1] for k in range(3))),
    (sum(A[1][k] * A_T[k][0] for k in range(3)), sum(A[1][k] * A_T[k][1] for k in range(3)))
)

def input_number(matrix, matrix_name, matrix_position):
        row = int(input(f"Enter row number of the {matrix_name}: ")) - 1
        col = int(input(f"Enter column number of the {matrix_name}: ")) - 1
        value = matrix[row][col]
        print(f'The "{matrix_position}{row+1}{col+1}" element in the {matrix_name} matrix is {value}')

def get_top_n_elements(lst, index, n=4, reverse=True):
    return sorted(lst, key=lambda x: x[index], reverse=reverse)[:n]

top_points = get_top_n_elements(sublists, 1)

# ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô sublists
sublists = [data_game[i:i+4] for i in range(0, len(data_game), 4)]

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô: ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å index ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
def calculate_average(lst, index):
    return sum(sublist[index] for sublist in lst) / len(lst)

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô: ‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô index ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
def get_highest_by_index(lst, index):
    return max(lst, key=lambda x: x[index])

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢

highest_ratio = get_highest_by_index(sublists, 3)

def filter_by_threshold(lst, point_threshold, ratio_threshold):
    filtered = [] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á list ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏ì‡∏ë‡πå
    for sublist in lst: # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÉ‡∏ô sublists
        if sublist[1] >= point_threshold and sublist[3] <= ratio_threshold: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏ì‡∏ë‡πå
            filtered.append(sublist) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏ì‡∏ë‡πå‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô filtered
    return filtered

# ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏ì‡∏ë‡πå
point_threshold = 5 # ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≥‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î
ratio_threshold = 4.5 # ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î

# ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•
filtered_data = filter_by_threshold(sublists, point_threshold, ratio_threshold) # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á

import numpy as np  # ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ numpy ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ã‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô

print('*' * 70)
print('Matrix Operations with NumPy'.center(70))
print('*' * 70)

# ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏ã‡πå A (‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£)
A = np.array([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], [7, 8, 10]])

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Determinant
def determinant(matrix):
    det = np.linalg.det(matrix)
    return round(det, 2)  # ‡∏õ‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏®‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏¢‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠ 2 ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Inverse
def inverse(matrix):
    det = determinant(matrix)
    if det == 0:
        return "Matrix is singular (no inverse)"  # ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà determinant ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô 0
    return np.linalg.inv(matrix)

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print("Matrix A:")
print(A)
print("\nDeterminant of A:", determinant(A))
print("\nInverse of A:")
print(inverse(A))

    password = input("Set your password:")

            print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 3 consecutive digits\n")
        elif (re.search(r'[A-Z]', password) and
              re.search(r'[a-z]', password) and
              re.search(r'[0-9]', password) and

            break
        else:
            print("!!!ERROR!!! Your password does not meet the complexity requirements\n")

        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must contain at least 8 characters\n")
    elif len(password) > 16:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 16 characters\n")

import re

while True:
    password = input("Set your password:")

    if 8 <= len(password) <= 16:
        if (re.search(r'[A-Z]', password) and
            re.search(r'[a-z]', password) and
            re.search(r'[0-9]', password) and
            not re.search(r'(.)\1{2,}', password)):  # Check for repeated characters
            print(":-) Your password is valid (-: ")
            break

        elif re.search(r'(.)\1{2,}', password):  # Error for repeated characters
            print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain three consecutive identical characters\n")
        else:
            print("!!!ERROR!!! Your password does not meet the complexity requirements\n")
    elif len(password) < 8:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must contain at least 8 characters\n")
    elif len(password) > 16:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 16 characters\n")

    password = input("Set your password:")

    if 8 <= len(password) <= 16:
        # Check first and last character requirements
        if not (re.match(r'[A-Za-z0-9!@#$%^&*]', password[0]) and 
                re.match(r'[A-Za-z0-9!@#$%^&*]', password[-1])):
            print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must start and end with a valid character (no spaces or special symbols other than allowed)\n")
        elif (re.search(r'[A-Z]', password) and
              re.search(r'[a-z]', password) and
              re.search(r'[0-9]', password) and
              re.search(r'[!@#$%^&*]', password)):
            print(":-) Your password is valid and secure (-: ")
            break
        else:
            print("!!!ERROR!!! Your password does not meet the complexity requirements\n")
    elif len(password) < 8:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must contain at least 8 characters\n")
    elif len(password) > 16:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 16 characters\n")

        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must contain at least 8 characters\n")
    elif len(password) > 16:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 16 characters\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏Ç‡πá‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô
import re

while True:
    password = input("Set your password:")

    # Check password length
    if 8 <= len(password) <= 16:
        # Check if password meets all criteria
        if (re.search(r'[A-Z]', password) and  # At least one uppercase letter
            re.search(r'[a-z]', password) and  # At least one lowercase letter
            re.search(r'[0-9]', password) and  # At least one digit
            re.search(r'[!@#$%^&*]', password)):  # At least one special character
            print(":-) Your password is strong (-: ")
            break
        
        # Check missing criteria
        missing_criteria = []
        if not re.search(r'[A-Z]', password):
            missing_criteria.append("an uppercase letter")
        if not re.search(r'[a-z]', password):
            missing_criteria.append("a lowercase letter")
        if not re.search(r'[0-9]', password):
            missing_criteria.append("a digit")
        if not re.search(r'[!@#$%^&*]', password):
            missing_criteria.append("a special character")

        print(f"!!!ERROR!!! Your password is missing {', '.join(missing_criteria)}\n")

    elif len(password) < 8:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must contain at least 8 characters\n")
    elif len(password) > 16:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 16 characters\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á 8-16 ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£
import re

while True:
    password = input("Set your password:")

    if " " in password:  # Check for spaces
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain spaces\n")
        continue

    if 8 <= len(password) <= 16:
        if (re.search(r'[A-Z]', password) and
            re.search(r'[a-z]', password) and
            re.search(r'[0-9]', password) and
            re.search(r'[!@#$%^&*]', password)):
            print(":-) Your password is valid and secure (-: ")
            break
        else:
            print("!!!ERROR!!! Your password does not meet the complexity requirements\n")
    elif len(password) < 8:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must contain at least 8 characters\n")
    elif len(password) > 16:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 16 characters\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô
