# ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏ç‡πà ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡πá‡∏Å ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏û‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏®‡∏©
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Regular Expression ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö
# ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏î ‡πÜ ‡∏à‡∏∞
# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
# ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î ‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏µ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏à‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢ ‡πÜ ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´
# ‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î
# ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏á‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç
# ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏î Ctrl+C ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏´‡∏¢‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°
import re

while True:
    password = input("Set your password:")
    confirm_password = input("Confirm your password:")

    if password != confirm_password:  # Check if passwords match
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The passwords do not match\n") # Print error message
    elif 8 <= len(password) <= 16: # Check if password length is between 8 and 16 characters
        if (re.search(r'[A-Z]', password) and # Check if password meets complexity requirements
              re.search(r'[a-z]', password) and # using regular expressions (regex) to match patterns 
              re.search(r'[0-9]', password) and # for uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
              re.search(r'[!@#$%^&*]', password)):
            print(":-) Your password is valid and secure (-: ")
            break
        else:
            print("!!!ERROR!!! Your password does not meet the complexity requirements\n")
    elif len(password) < 8:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must contain at least 8 characters\n")
    elif len(password) > 16:
        print("!!!ERROR!!! The password must not contain more than 16 characters\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Factorial series ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á n ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ n ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ
print('Making a list of Factorial series of n')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' of Factorial number:"))
result = 1
list_of_n = []

for i in range(1, n+1):
    result *= i
    list_of_n.append(result)
    
print(f"A list of Factorial series of {n} is {list_of_n}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Recursive ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå
# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Recursive ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå
print('Calculating Factorial series using recursion')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' for Recursive Factorial: "))
factorial_list = []

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Recursive
def recursive_factorial(num):
    if num == 1:
        return 1
    return num * recursive_factorial(num - 1)

# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå Factorial
for i in range(1, n+1):
    factorial_list.append(recursive_factorial(i))

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print(f"Factorial series using recursion: {factorial_list}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ Factorial ‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
# ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ Factorial ‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
print('Checking if Factorials contain any prime numbers')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' for Factorial series: "))
result = 1
factorial_list = []
prime_check = []

def is_prime(num):
    if num < 2:
        return False
    for i in range(2, int(num**0.5) + 1):
        if num % i == 0:
            return False
    return True

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ prime
for i in range(1, n+1):
    result *= i
    factorial_list.append(result)
    prime_check.append(is_prime(result))  # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏° True/False ‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ prime

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print(f"Factorial series: {factorial_list}")
print(f"Prime check for each Factorial: {prime_check}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô 2, 8, 16
# ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á Factorial ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô 2, 8, 16
print('Converting Factorials to different bases')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' for Factorial series: "))
result = 1
factorial_list = []

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á
for i in range(1, n+1):
    result *= i
    factorial_list.append((result, bin(result), oct(result), hex(result)))  # Factorial, ‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô 2, 8, 16

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
for i, values in enumerate(factorial_list, start=1):
    print(f"{i}! = {values[0]} | Binary: {values[1]} | Octal: {values[2]} | Hex: {values[3]}")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡πà
# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå Factorial ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡πà
print('Generating Odd Factorial series')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' for Odd Factorial series: "))
result = 1
odd_factorial_list = []

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡πà
for i in range(1, n+1):
    if i % 2 != 0:  # ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πá‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡πà
        result *= i
        odd_factorial_list.append(result)

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print(f"Odd Factorial series: {odd_factorial_list}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏•‡∏≥‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å n ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á 1 ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏¢‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö
# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡∏•‡∏≥‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å n ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á 1
print('Generating Reverse Factorial series')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' for Reverse Factorial series: "))
result = 1
reverse_factorial_list = []

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏¢‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö
for i in range(1, n+1):
    result *= i

# Loop ‡∏¢‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö
for i in range(n, 0, -1):
    reverse_factorial_list.append(result)
    result //= i  # ‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏•‡∏î Factorial

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print(f"Reverse Factorial series: {reverse_factorial_list}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå Factorial ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢ n ‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
import random

# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå Factorial ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢ n ‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
print('Generating Randomized Factorial series')
lower = int(input("Enter lower bound for random n: "))
upper = int(input("Enter upper bound for random n: "))
n = random.randint(lower, upper)  # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ n
print(f"Randomly chosen n: {n}")

result = 1
factorial_list = []

for i in range(1, n+1):
    result *= i
    factorial_list.append(result)

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print(f"Factorial series for random n={n}: {factorial_list}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ Fibonacci ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô
# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ Fibonacci ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô
print('Generating Factorial and Fibonacci series')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' for series: "))
result = 1
factorial_list = []
fibonacci_list = [0, 1]  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå Fibonacci

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ Fibonacci
for i in range(1, n+1):
    result *= i
    factorial_list.append(result)  # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏° Factorial
    if i > 1:
        fibonacci_list.append(fibonacci_list[-1] + fibonacci_list[-2])  # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏° Fibonacci

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print(f"Factorial series: {factorial_list}")
print(f"Fibonacci series: {fibonacci_list[:n]}\n")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÇ‡∏°‡∏î‡∏π‡∏•‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà
# Factorial ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÇ‡∏°‡∏î‡∏π‡∏•‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà
print('Generating Factorial series with modulus operation')
n = int(input("Enter 'n' for Factorial series: "))
mod_val = int(input("Enter modulus value: "))
result = 1
mod_list = []

# ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì Factorial ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏£ mod
for i in range(1, n+1):
    result *= i
    mod_list.append(result % mod_val)  # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ mod

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
print(f"Factorial series modulus {mod_val}: {mod_list}\n")

def int_to_roman(number):
    if number <= 0 or number > 1000000:
        return "Number out of range (must be 1 - 1,000,000)"
    
    roman_numerals = [
        ('MÃÖ', 1000000), ('CÃÖMÃÖ', 900000), ('DÃÖ', 500000), ('CÃÖDÃÖ', 400000),
        ('CÃÖ', 100000), ('XÃÖCÃÖ', 90000), ('LÃÖ', 50000), ('XÃÖLÃÖ', 40000),
        ('XÃÖ', 10000), ('IÃÖXÃÖ', 9000), ('VÃÖ', 5000), ('IÃÖVÃÖ', 4000),
        ('M', 1000), ('CM', 900), ('D', 500), ('CD', 400),
        ('C', 100), ('XC', 90), ('L', 50), ('XL', 40),
        ('X', 10), ('IX', 9), ('V', 5), ('IV', 4),
        ('I', 1)
    ]

    result = ""
    for roman, value in roman_numerals:
        while number >= value:
            result += roman
            number -= value

    return result


def roman_to_int(roman):
    roman_numerals = {
        'MÃÖ': 1000000, 'CÃÖMÃÖ': 900000, 'DÃÖ': 500000, 'CÃÖDÃÖ': 400000,
        'CÃÖ': 100000, 'XÃÖCÃÖ': 90000, 'LÃÖ': 50000, 'XÃÖLÃÖ': 40000,
        'XÃÖ': 10000, 'IÃÖXÃÖ': 9000, 'VÃÖ': 5000, 'IÃÖVÃÖ': 4000,

        'C': 100, 'XC': 90, 'L': 50, 'XL': 40,
        'X': 10, 'IX': 9, 'V': 5, 'IV': 4,
        'I': 1
    }
    
    index = 0
    result = 0
    while index < len(roman):
        # Check for two-character symbols
        if index + 1 < len(roman) and roman[index:index + 2] in roman_numerals:
            result += roman_numerals[roman[index:index + 2]]
            index += 2
        # Check for one-character symbols
        elif roman[index] in roman_numerals:
            result += roman_numerals[roman[index]]
            index += 1
        else:
            return "Invalid Roman numeral"
    return result

import random

def roman_guessing_game():
    """‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤ Roman Numeral"""
    number = random.randint(1, 100)
    roman = int_to_roman(number)
    print("Welcome to the Roman Numeral Guessing Game!")
    print(f"Roman Numeral: {roman}")
    
    attempts = 3
    for attempt in range(1, attempts + 1):
        try:
            guess = int(input(f"Attempt {attempt}/{attempts}: Guess the number: "))
            if guess == number:
                print("Congratulations! Your guess is correct.")
                return
            elif guess < number:
                print("Hint: The number is higher.")
            else:
                print("Hint: The number is lower.")
        except ValueError:
            print("Please enter a valid number.")
    
    print(f"Sorry, you've used all attempts. The correct number was {number}.")

def convert_list_to_roman(numbers):
    """‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á List ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô Roman Numerals"""

        (number, int_to_roman(number)) if 0 < number <= 1000000 else (number, "Out of range")
        for number in numbers
    ]

        'XÃÖ': 10000, 'IÃÖXÃÖ': 9000, 'VÃÖ': 5000, 'IÃÖVÃÖ': 4000,
        'M': 1000, 'CM': 900, 'D': 500, 'CD': 400,
        'C': 100, 'XC': 90, 'L': 50, 'XL': 40,
        'X': 10, 'IX': 9, 'V': 5, 'IV': 4,
        'I': 1
    }
    
    index = 0
    result = 0
    while index < len(roman):
        # Check for two-character symbols
        if index + 1 < len(roman) and roman[index:index + 2] in roman_numerals:
            result += roman_numerals[roman[index:index + 2]]
            index += 2
        # Check for one-character symbols
        elif roman[index] in roman_numerals:
            result += roman_numerals[roman[index]]
            index += 1
        else:
            return "Invalid Roman numeral"
    return result

import csv

def batch_convert_to_roman(input_file, output_file):
    """‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå CSV ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô Roman Numerals"""
    try:
        with open(input_file, "r") as infile, open(output_file, "w", newline="") as outfile:
            reader = csv.reader(infile)
            writer = csv.writer(outfile)
            writer.writerow(["Number", "Roman Numeral"])
            
            for row in reader:
                try:
                    number = int(row[0])
                    roman = int_to_roman(number)
                    writer.writerow([number, roman])
                except ValueError:
                    writer.writerow([row[0], "Invalid"])
        return f"Results written to {output_file}"
    except FileNotFoundError:
        return "Input file not found."

# Example ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô
input_csv = "numbers.csv"  # ‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏°‡∏µ‡πÅ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
output_csv = "roman_results.csv"
print(batch_convert_to_roman(input_csv, output_csv))

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô Roman Numeral ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô
def int_to_roman(number):
    if number <= 0 or number > 1000000:
        return "Number out of range (must be 1 - 1,000,000)"
    
    roman_numerals = [
        ('MÃÖ', 1000000), ('CÃÖMÃÖ', 900000), ('DÃÖ', 500000), ('CÃÖDÃÖ', 400000),
        ('CÃÖ', 100000), ('XÃÖCÃÖ', 90000), ('LÃÖ', 50000), ('XÃÖLÃÖ', 40000),
        ('XÃÖ', 10000), ('IÃÖXÃÖ', 9000), ('VÃÖ', 5000), ('IÃÖVÃÖ', 4000),
        ('M', 1000), ('CM', 900), ('D', 500), ('CD', 400),
        ('C', 100), ('XC', 90), ('L', 50), ('XL', 40),
        ('X', 10), ('IX', 9), ('V', 5), ('IV', 4),
        ('I', 1)
    ]

    result = ""
    for roman, value in roman_numerals:
        while number >= value:
            result += roman
            number -= value

    return result


def roman_to_int(roman):
    roman_numerals = {
        'MÃÖ': 1000000, 'CÃÖMÃÖ': 900000, 'DÃÖ': 500000, 'CÃÖDÃÖ': 400000,
        'CÃÖ': 100000, 'XÃÖCÃÖ': 90000, 'LÃÖ': 50000, 'XÃÖLÃÖ': 40000,
        'XÃÖ': 10000, 'IÃÖXÃÖ': 9000, 'VÃÖ': 5000, 'IÃÖVÃÖ': 4000,
        'M': 1000, 'CM': 900, 'D': 500, 'CD': 400,
        'C': 100, 'XC': 90, 'L': 50, 'XL': 40,
        'X': 10, 'IX': 9, 'V': 5, 'IV': 4,
        'I': 1
    }
    
    index = 0
    result = 0
    while index < len(roman):
        # Check for two-character symbols
        if index + 1 < len(roman) and roman[index:index + 2] in roman_numerals:
            result += roman_numerals[roman[index:index + 2]]
            index += 2
        # Check for one-character symbols
        elif roman[index] in roman_numerals:
            result += roman_numerals[roman[index]]
            index += 1
        else:
            return "Invalid Roman numeral"
    return result

def write_roman_to_file(number, filename="roman_output.txt"):
    """‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô Roman Numeral ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå"""
    roman = int_to_roman(number)
    with open(filename, "w") as file:
        file.write(f"Number: {number}\nRoman Numeral: {roman}")
    return f"Result written to {filename}"


def read_roman_from_file(filename="roman_input.txt"):
    """‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ Roman Numeral ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç"""
    try:
        with open(filename, "r") as file:
            roman = file.read().strip()
            result = roman_to_int(roman)
            return f"Roman: {roman}\nNumber: {result}"
    except FileNotFoundError:
        return f"File {filename} not found."
    except Exception as e:
        return f"An error occurred: {e}"

while True:
    print("\nRoman Numeral Converter (File Mode)")
    print("1. Convert number to Roman numeral and save to file")
    print("2. Read Roman numeral from file and convert to number")
    print("3. Exit")
    
    choice = input("Choose an option (1/2/3): ")
    
    if choice == "1":
        try:
            number = int(input("Enter a number (1 - 1,000,000): "))
            print(write_roman_to_file(number))
        except ValueError:
            print("Please enter a valid number.")
    
    elif choice == "2":

        break
    
    else:
        print("Invalid option. Please choose again.")

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏•‡∏î‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á
import random

def adaptive_guessing_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏•‡∏î‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = 5 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢

    print("\n***** Adaptive Guessing Game *****")
    print("Guess the number. Close guesses will give you more attempts!\n")

    while attempts > 0:
        print(f"Remaining attempts: {attempts}")
        guess = int(input("Enter your guess: "))
        diff = abs(secret_number - guess)

        if guess == secret_number:
            print(f"Congratulations! You guessed the number {secret_number}.")
            return
        elif diff <= 5:
            print("You're very close! You earned an extra attempt.")
            attempts += 1
        else:
            print("Keep trying!")
        attempts -= 1

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")

adaptive_guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ PC ‡∏™‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢ ‡πÉ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ä‡∏ô‡∏∞
import random

def alternating_guessing_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ PC ‡∏™‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢ ‡πÉ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ä‡∏ô‡∏∞
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = 10 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢

    print("\n***** Alternating Guessing Game (Player vs PC) *****")
    print("Take turns with the PC to guess the number.\n")
    
    player_low, player_high = 1, 100 # ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ
    pc_low, pc_high = 1, 100 # ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà PC ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ

    for round_num in range(attempts): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        print(f"\nRound {round_num + 1}") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        
        # Player's turn
        print("Your turn:")
        player_guess = int(input(f"Guess a number ({player_low}-{player_high}): ")) # ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        if player_guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print(f"Congratulations! You guessed the secret number {secret_number}. You win!")
            return
        elif player_guess < secret_number: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
            print("Too low!")
            player_low = max(player_low, player_guess + 1) # ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ
        else:
            print("Too high!")
            player_high = min(player_high, player_guess - 1) # ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ
        
        # PC's turn
        print("\nPC's turn:")
        pc_guess = random.randint(pc_low, pc_high) # PC ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        print(f"PC guesses: {pc_guess}") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á PC
        if pc_guess == secret_number:   # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print(f"The PC guessed the secret number {secret_number}. PC wins!")
            return
        elif pc_guess < secret_number: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
            print("PC's guess is too low!")
            pc_low = max(pc_low, pc_guess + 1)
        else: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ 
            print("PC's guess is too high!")
            pc_high = min(pc_high, pc_guess - 1)

    print(f"\nNo one guessed the secret number. The number was {secret_number}. It's a draw!")

alternating_guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á
import random

def hint_guessing_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = 5 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢

    print("\n***** Hint Guessing Game *****")
    print("Hints will tell you if you're very far, far, close, or very close.\n")

    for attempt in range(1, attempts + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        guess = int(input(f"Attempt {attempt}: Enter your guess: ")) # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        diff = abs(secret_number - guess) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö

        if guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print(f"Correct! You guessed the number {secret_number}.")
            return
        elif diff > 20: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 20
            print("Hint: You're very far.")
        elif diff > 10: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 10
            print("Hint: You're far.")
        elif diff > 5: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 5
            print("Hint: You're close.")
        else:
            print("Hint: You're very close.")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")

hint_guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô
import random

def scoring_based_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏•‡∏î‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100)
    max_score = 100 # ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô
    attempts = 10 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö

    print("\n***** Scoring-Based Guessing Game *****")
    print(f"Try to guess the number. You start with {max_score} points.\n")

    for attempt in range(1, attempts + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        guess = int(input(f"Attempt {attempt}: Enter your guess: "))

        if guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print(f"Congratulations! You guessed the number {secret_number}.")
            print(f"Your score is {max_score}.")
            return
        else:
            max_score -= 10 # ‡∏•‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î
            print("Wrong guess! Your score decreases.")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")
    print(f"Your final score is {max_score}.")

scoring_based_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏≥‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏ß‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏ß
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢ ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏Å 5 ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
import random

def decoy_numbers_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏≥‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏Ç‡∏ß‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏ß
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    decoy_numbers = random.sample(range(1, 101), 5) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏Å 5 ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = 7 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢

    print("\n***** Decoy Numbers Guessing Game *****")
    print(f"The secret number is one of these: {decoy_numbers + [secret_number]}")

    for _ in range(attempts):
        guess = int(input("Enter your guess: "))

        if guess == secret_number:
            print(f"Congratulations! You guessed the number {secret_number}.")
            return
        elif guess in decoy_numbers:
            print(f"{guess} is a decoy! Keep trying.")
        else:
            print("Wrong guess!")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")

decoy_numbers_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà 1-100 ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡πÇ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢ 7 ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
import random

def game_with_history():
    """‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô"""
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = 7 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
    history = [] # ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤

    print("\n***** Guessing Game with History *****")

    for attempt in range(1, attempts + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        guess = int(input(f"Attempt {attempt}: Enter your guess: "))
        history.append(guess) # ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤

        if guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print(f"Correct! You guessed the number {secret_number}.")
            print(f"Your guesses: {history}")
            return
        elif guess < secret_number: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            print("Your guess is too low.")
        else:
            print("Your guess is too high.")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")
    print(f"Your guesses: {history}")

game_with_history()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏ô
import random

def multiplayer_guessing_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏ô
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    max_attempts = 10 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
    players = int(input("Enter number of players: ")) # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô
    attempts = {player: 0 for player in range(1, players + 1)} # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô

    print("\n***** Multiplayer Guessing Game *****")
    print(f"Secret number is between 1 and 100. Each player has {max_attempts} attempts.\n")

    for _ in range(max_attempts): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        for player in range(1, players + 1):
            guess = int(input(f"Player {player}, enter your guess: "))
            attempts[player] += 1 # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô

            if guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
                print(f"\nPlayer {player} wins! The secret number was {secret_number}.")
                return
            elif guess < secret_number: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
                print(f"Player {player}, your guess is too low.")
            else:
                print(f"Player {player}, your guess is too high.")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")
    for player, attempt in attempts.items(): # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô
        print(f"Player {player} made {attempt} attempts.")

multiplayer_guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡πÑ‡∏ß‡πâ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤
import random

def random_attempts_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = random.randint(3, 10) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢

    print(f"\n***** Random Attempts Guessing Game *****")
    print(f"You have {attempts} attempts to guess the number.\n")

    for attempt in range(1, attempts + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        guess = int(input(f"Attempt {attempt}: Enter your guess: "))

        if guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print(f"Congratulations! You guessed the number {secret_number}.")
            return
        elif guess < secret_number: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
            print("Your guess is too low.")
        else:
            print("Your guess is too high.")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")

random_attempts_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á
import random

def scoring_guessing_game(): 
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = 5 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
    score = 0 # ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô

    print("\n***** Scoring Guessing Game *****")
    print("Try to guess the number. The closer you are, the higher your score.\n")

    for attempt in range(1, attempts + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        guess = int(input(f"Attempt {attempt}: Enter your guess: ")) # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        diff = abs(secret_number - guess) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö
        points = max(0, 10 - diff)  # ‡∏¢‡∏¥‡πà‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ‡∏¢‡∏¥‡πà‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î 10
        score += points # ‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô

        if guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print(f"Correct! You guessed the number {secret_number}.")
            break
        elif guess < secret_number: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
            print(f"Your guess is too low. You scored {points} points.")
        else: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
            print(f"Your guess is too high. You scored {points} points.")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}. Total score: {score}")

scoring_guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç 1-99 ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡πÇ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢ 5 ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏ô‡∏≥‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÑ‡∏´‡∏° ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏´‡∏°
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç 1-99 ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢ ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏ô‡∏≥‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÑ‡∏´‡∏° ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏´‡∏°
import random

def guessing_game():
    random_number = random.randint(1, 99) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç 1-99
    attempts = 5 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
    low, high = 1, 99 # ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ

    print("***** Welcome to the game of guessing number *****")

    for attempt in range(attempts): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        print(f"{'-'*21} round{attempt + 1} {'-'*21}") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        print(f"Enter an integer from {low} to {high} : ", end="") # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢

        input_number = int(input()) # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢

        if input_number == random_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print("#" * 50) 
            print("   *** CONGRATURATION *** Your guess is correct  ")
            print("#" * 50)
            return
        
        elif input_number < random_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°
            print("Hint: Your guess is low")
            low = max(low, input_number + 1) # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å
        else:
            print("Hint: Your guess is high")
            high = min(high, input_number - 1) # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å

    print("#" * 50)
    print(f"!!!SORRY!!! The secret number is {random_number}".center(50))
    print("#" * 50)

guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏π‡∏ç‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô high_stakes_game() ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ random.randint() ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÇ‡∏°‡∏î‡∏π‡∏• random
import random

def high_stakes_game():
    """‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏π‡∏ç‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î"""
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    score = 10 # ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô

    print("\n***** High-Stakes Double or Nothing Game *****")
    print("Guess correctly to double your score. A wrong guess resets your score to 0.\n")

    while True:
        guess = int(input("Enter your guess: "))

        if guess == secret_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            score *= 2 # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤
            print(f"Correct! Your score is now {score}.")
            break
        else:
            score = 0 # ‡∏£‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏ã‡πá‡∏ï‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô 0
            print("Wrong guess! Your score is reset to 0.")
            break

    print(f"The secret number was {secret_number}. Your final score: {score}")

high_stakes_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ã‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà
# ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ã‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î 4 ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á (A, B, C, D)
import random

def letter_range_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ã‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100)
    attempts = 7 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
    ranges = {'A': (1, 25), 'B': (26, 50), 'C': (51, 75), 'D': (76, 100)} # ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ

    print("\n***** Letter-Range Guessing Game *****")
    print("Guess the range where the secret number belongs (A/B/C/D).")

    for _ in range(attempts):
        guess = input("Enter your range guess (A/B/C/D): ").upper()

        if guess in ranges: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            low, high = ranges[guess] # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å
            if low <= secret_number <= high: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏π‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
                print(f"Correct! The secret number {secret_number} is in range {guess}.")
                return
            else:
                print(f"Wrong! The secret number is not in range {guess}.")
        else:
            print("Invalid range. Choose A, B, C, or D.")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")

letter_range_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏ï‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏Ñ‡∏ö‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å 1-100 ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏•‡∏î‡∏•‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÜ ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á 7 ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
import random

def shrinking_range_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏ï‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏Ñ‡∏ö‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100)
    low, high = 1, 100 # ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô
    attempts = 7 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö

    print("\n***** Progressive Range Shrinking Game *****")
    print(f"The secret number is between {low} and {high}.\n")

    for _ in range(attempts):
        guess = int(input(f"Enter your guess ({low}-{high}): "))

        if guess == secret_number:
            print(f"Correct! The secret number is {secret_number}.")
            return
        elif guess < secret_number:
            print("Your guess is too low.")
            low = max(low, guess + 1)
        else:
            print("Your guess is too high.")
            high = min(high, guess - 1)

        print(f"New range: {low} to {high}")

    print(f"\nGame over! The secret number was {secret_number}.")

shrinking_range_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏Ñ
def reverse_guessing_game():
    """‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏û‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î"""
    print("\nThink of a number between 1 and 100, and I will try to guess it.")
    low, high = 1, 100

    while low <= high: # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏£‡πá‡∏à‡∏™‡∏¥‡πâ‡∏ô
        guess = (low + high) // 2 # ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á
        print(f"My guess is {guess}.")
        response = input("Is it correct (c), too low (l), or too high (h)? ").lower()

        if response == 'c': # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print("Yay! I guessed it!") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            return
        elif response == 'l': # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô
            low = guess + 1 # ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≥‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î
        elif response == 'h': # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô
            high = guess - 1 # ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏π‡∏á‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î
        else:
            print("Invalid response. Please enter 'c', 'l', or 'h'.")

    print("Something went wrong. Are you sure you thought of a number?")

reverse_guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤
# ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
import random
import time

def time_limited_game():
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤
    secret_number = random.randint(1, 100) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    time_limit = 30  # 30 ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ

    print("\n***** Time-Limited Guessing Game *****") 
    print(f"You have {time_limit} seconds to guess the number.\n")
    start_time = time.time()

    while time.time() - start_time < time_limit: # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Å
        guess = int(input("Enter your guess: "))

        if guess == secret_number:
            print(f"Congratulations! You guessed the number {secret_number}.") 
            return
        elif guess < secret_number:
            print("Your guess is too low.")
        else:
            print("Your guess is too high.")

    print(f"\nTime's up! The secret number was {secret_number}.")

time_limited_game() # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏°‡∏≤ ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏î ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÑ‡∏õ
import random

def dynamic_guessing_game():
    low, high = 1, 99
    attempts = 5

    print("***** Welcome to the Dynamic Guessing Game *****")
    random_number = random.randint(low, high)  # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô

    for attempt in range(attempts):
        print(f"{'-'*21} round{attempt + 1} {'-'*21}")
        print(f"Enter an integer from {low} to {high} : ", end="")
        
        input_number = int(input())
        
        if input_number == random_number:
            print("#" * 50)
            print("   *** CONGRATULATION *** Your guess is correct  ")
            print("#" * 50)
            return
        else:
            print("Wrong guess! A new secret number has been generated.")
            random_number = random.randint(low, high)  # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
            if input_number < random_number:
                print("Hint: Your guess was too low.")
            else:
                print("Hint: Your guess was too high.")

    print("#" * 50)
    print("You have run out of attempts!")
    print("#" * 50)

dynamic_guessing_game()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç 1-99 ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤ 10 ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ
import random
import time

def guessing_game_with_timer():
    random_number = random.randint(1, 99)
    attempts = 5
    low, high = 1, 99
    time_limit = 10  # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô 10 ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ

    print("***** Welcome to the Timed Guessing Game *****")

    for attempt in range(attempts):
        print(f"{'-'*21} round{attempt + 1} {'-'*21}")
        print(f"You have {time_limit} seconds to guess!")
        print(f"Enter an integer from {low} to {high} : ", end="")
        
        start_time = time.time()
        try:
            input_number = int(input())
            elapsed_time = time.time() - start_time

            if elapsed_time > time_limit:
                print("Time's up! You took too long!")
                break

            if input_number == random_number:
                print("#" * 50)
                print("   *** CONGRATULATION *** Your guess is correct  ")
                print("#" * 50)
                return
            elif input_number < random_number:
                print("Hint: Your guess is low")
                low = max(low, input_number + 1)
            else:
                print("Hint: Your guess is high")
                high = min(high, input_number - 1)
        except ValueError:
            print("Invalid input! Please enter a number.")

    print("#" * 50)
    print(f"!!!SORRY!!! The secret number is {random_number}".center(50))
    print("#" * 50)

guessing_game_with_timer()

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô
import random

def scoring_guessing_game():
    random_number = random.randint(1, 99) # ‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç
    attempts = 5 # ‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
    low, high = 1, 99 # ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
    score = 100  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏° 100

    print("***** Welcome to the Scoring Guessing Game *****")

    for attempt in range(attempts): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏à‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö
        print(f"{'-'*21} round{attempt + 1} {'-'*21}") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô
        print(f"Enter an integer from {low} to {high} : ", end="") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        input_number = int(input()) # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏•‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢
        
        if input_number == random_number: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å
            print("#" * 50)
            print("   *** CONGRATURATION *** Your guess is correct  ")
            print(f"Your final score is {score}")
            print("#" * 50)
            return
        else:
            diff = abs(input_number - random_number) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö
            if diff <= 10: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ
                score -= 5  # ‡∏´‡∏±‡∏Å 5 ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ
                print("Close! But not quite.")
            else: # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
                score -= 10  # ‡∏´‡∏±‡∏Å 10 ‡∏Ñ‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏´‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
                print("Not even close!")

            if input_number < random_number: # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ
                print("Hint: Your guess is low")
                low = max(low, input_number + 1) 
            else:
                print("Hint: Your guess is high")
                high = min(high, input_number - 1)

    print("#" * 50)
    print(f"!!!SORRY!!! The secret number is {random_number}".center(50))
    print(f"Your final score is {score}".center(50))
    print("#" * 50)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Recursive Function
def pascal_triangle(input_number):
    if input_number == 0:
        return [1]

    else:
        previous_row = pascal_triangle(input_number - 1) # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏°
        current_row = [1] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà

        for i in range(1, len(previous_row)): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
            current_row.append(previous_row[i - 1] + previous_row[i]) # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°

        current_row.append(1) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢
        return current_row # ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö

input_number = int(input("Please Enter Degree of Pascal Triangle: "))
print(f"{pascal_triangle(input_number)}\n")

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Iterative
def pascal_triangle_iterative(n):
    triangle = []  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
    for i in range(n + 1):  # ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        row = [1]  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ 1
        if i > 0:  # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πà‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏£‡∏Å
            for j in range(1, i):
                row.append(triangle[i - 1][j - 1] + triangle[i - 1][j])  # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤
            row.append(1)  # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏° 1 ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        triangle.append(row)  # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô Triangle
    return triangle

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ
n = int(input("Enter the number of rows for Pascal Triangle: "))
result = pascal_triangle_iterative(n)

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
for row in result:
    print(row)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå
def pascal_triangle_to_file(n, filename): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå
    def generate_row(row): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        current = [1] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        for i in range(1, len(row)): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
            current.append(row[i - 1] + row[i]) # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°
        current.append(1) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢
        return current # ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö

    triangle = [[1]] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏£‡∏Å
    for _ in range(1, n + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        triangle.append(generate_row(triangle[-1])) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£

    # ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå
    with open(filename, 'w') as file: # ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏¥‡∏î‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô
        for row in triangle: # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå
            file.write(" ".join(map(str, row)) + "\n") # ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå

    return f"Pascal Triangle saved to {filename}" # ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö
n = int(input("Enter number of rows for Pascal Triangle: "))

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Modular (‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå mod k)
def pascal_triangle_modular(n, k):
    triangle = [] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
    for i in range(n + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        row = [1] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        if i > 0: # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 0
            for j in range(1, i): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
                row.append((triangle[i - 1][j - 1] + triangle[i - 1][j]) % k)  # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå mod k
            row.append(1) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢
        triangle.append(row) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
    return triangle

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ mod
n = int(input("Enter the number of rows for Pascal Triangle: "))
k = int(input("Enter the modular value: "))
result = pascal_triangle_modular(n, k)

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
for row in result:
    print(row)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ NumPy
import numpy as np

# ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ NumPy ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle
def pascal_triangle_numpy(n): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle
    triangle = np.zeros((n + 1, n + 1), dtype=int)  # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á array ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô 0
    for i in range(n + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        triangle[i][0] = 1  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ 1
        for j in range(1, i + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
            triangle[i][j] = triangle[i - 1][j - 1] + triangle[i - 1][j]  # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á
    return triangle # ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö

result = pascal_triangle_numpy(n) # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
for row in result: # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•
    print(row[row > 0])  # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô 0

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô 2
def pascal_triangle_binary(n): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô 2
    triangle = [] # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
    for i in range(n + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        row = [1] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        if i > 0: # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 0
            for j in range(1, i): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
                row.append(triangle[i - 1][j - 1] + triangle[i - 1][j]) # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°
            row.append(1) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢
        # ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô 2
        row = [bin(x)[2:] for x in row] # ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô 2
        triangle.append(row) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
    return triangle

    print(" ".join(row)) # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå

# ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î
def pascal_triangle_all(n):
    if n == 0:
        return [[1]]  # ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡∏°‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á 1
    else:
        previous = pascal_triangle_all(n - 1)  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤
        last_row = previous[-1]  # ‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Pascal Triangle
        current_row = [1]  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ 1

        # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        for i in range(1, len(last_row)):
            current_row.append(last_row[i - 1] + last_row[i])

        current_row.append(1)  # ‡∏à‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ 1
        previous.append(current_row)  # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏•‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô Pascal Triangle ‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î
        return previous

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ
n = int(input("Enter the number of rows for Pascal Triangle: "))
result = pascal_triangle_all(n)

# ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏• Pascal Triangle ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
def pascal_triangle_with_sum(n):
    triangle = [] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
    row_sums = [] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
    for i in range(n + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        row = [1] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        if i > 0: # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 0
            for j in range(1, i):
                row.append(triangle[i - 1][j - 1] + triangle[i - 1][j]) # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°
            row.append(1) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢
        triangle.append(row)    # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
        row_sums.append(sum(row))  # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß 
    return triangle, row_sums # ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö

# ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö

    print(f"Row {i}: {row} (Sum: {row_sums[i]})") # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå

def pascal_triangle_even_only(n): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÅ‡∏ï‡πà‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà
    triangle = []  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏¥‡∏™‡∏ï‡πå‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
    for i in range(n + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        row = [1] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        if i > 0: # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ 0
            for j in range(1, i): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
                row.append(triangle[i - 1][j - 1] + triangle[i - 1][j]) # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°
            row.append(1) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢
        # ‡πÅ‡∏ó‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ "-" ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà
        row = ["-" if x % 2 != 0 else x for x in row] # ‡πÅ‡∏ó‡∏ô‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πà‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ "-"
        triangle.append(row) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£
    return triangle

def pascal_triangle_pyramid(n):
    def generate_row(row):
        current = [1] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        for i in range(1, len(row)): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
            current.append(row[i - 1] + row[i]) # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°
        current.append(1) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏™‡∏∏‡∏î‡∏ó‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏¢
        return current

    triangle = [[1]] # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏£‡∏Å
    for _ in range(1, n + 1): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        triangle.append(generate_row(triangle[-1])) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£

    return triangle

    print(" " * (n - i), " ".join(map(str, row))) # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå

# ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Lambda ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ Map
def pascal_triangle_lambda(n): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Pascal Triangle
    triangle = [[1]]  # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏£‡∏Å

    for _ in range(n): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß
        # ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ map ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        next_row = list(map(lambda x, y: x + y, [0] + triangle[-1], triangle[-1] + [0])) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà
        triangle.append(next_row) # ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£

    return triangle

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥
def secret_password(text, key):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base)
            result += shifted_char
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input non-characters.")
    return result

def repeat_encrypt(text, key, rounds): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥
    for _ in range(rounds): # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î
        text = secret_password(text, key) # ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°
    return text

try:
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Alphabet Only): ")
    key = int(input("Enter secret key (Number Only): "))
    rounds = int(input("Enter number of encryption rounds: "))

    # ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥
    ciphertext = repeat_encrypt(plaintext, key, rounds)
    print(f"The encrypted ciphertext after {rounds} rounds:", ciphertext)

    # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö
    decrypted_text = repeat_encrypt(ciphertext, -key, rounds)
    print(f'The decryption result after {rounds} rounds: {decrypted_text}')
except ValueError as e:
    print(e)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Hybrid ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Caesar Cipher ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ Reverse Alphabet
def secret_password(text, key):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base)
            result += shifted_char
        elif char.isspace():  # Space characters remain unchanged
            result += ' '
        else:  # Convert special characters to Unicode
            result += f"\\u{ord(char):04x}"
    return result

def reverse_alphabet_encrypt(text): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™ Reverse Alphabet
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')
            reversed_char = chr(shift_base + (25 - (ord(char) - shift_base)))
            result += reversed_char
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input contains invalid characters.")
    return result

def hybrid_encrypt(text, key): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Hybrid
    # ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Caesar
    encrypted_text = secret_password(text, key)
    # ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Reverse Alphabet
    return reverse_alphabet_encrypt(encrypted_text)

def hybrid_decrypt(text, key): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Hybrid
    # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å Reverse Alphabet
    decrypted_text = reverse_alphabet_encrypt(text)
    # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å Caesar
    return secret_password(decrypted_text, -key)

try:
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Alphabet Only): ")
    key = int(input("Enter secret key (Number Only): "))

    # ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Hybrid
    ciphertext = hybrid_encrypt(plaintext, key)
    print("The hybrid encrypted ciphertext:", ciphertext)

    # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Hybrid
    decrypted_text = hybrid_decrypt(ciphertext, key)
    print(f'The hybrid decryption result: {decrypted_text}')
except ValueError as e:
    print(e)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ Caesar Cipher
def secret_password(text, key): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°
    result = ""
    for char in text: # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°
        if char.isalpha(): # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a') # ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
            result += shifted_char # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
        elif char.isdigit(): # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            shifted_digit = (int(char) + key) % 10 # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
            result += str(shifted_digit) # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
        elif char in "!@#$%^&*()-_=+[]{};:,.<>?/": # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏±‡∏ç‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏ì‡πå‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            shifted_special = chr((ord(char) + key) % 256)  # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏™‡∏±‡∏ç‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏ì‡πå‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
            result += shifted_special # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏±‡∏ç‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏ì‡πå‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
        elif char.isspace(): # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            result += char # ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏ß‡πâ
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input contains unsupported characters.")
    return result

try:

    decrypted_text = secret_password(ciphertext, -key) # ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°
    print(f'The decryption result: {decrypted_text}') # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ Caesar cipher ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÅ‡∏ö‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ñ‡∏ß‡πÜ
def secret_password_row(text, key, row_count):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():  # Check if the character is a letter
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')  # Determine ASCII base
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base) # Calculate the shifted character
            result += shifted_char  # Append the encrypted character
        elif char.isspace():
            result += char
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input contains unsupported characters.")
    
    # Split the result into rows of approximately equal size
    row_size = len(result) // row_count + (len(result) % row_count > 0) # Calculate the row size
    return [result[i:i + row_size] for i in range(0, len(result), row_size)] # Split the result into rows

try:
    # Input text, key, and desired number of rows
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Alphabet Only): ")
    key = int(input("Enter secret key (Number Only): "))
    row_count = int(input("Enter number of rows for output (Integer Only): "))

    # Encrypt the plaintext and split it into rows
    encrypted_rows = secret_password_row(plaintext, key, row_count) # Encrypt and split the text
    print("The encrypted text split into rows:")
    for i, row in enumerate(encrypted_rows, 1):
        print(f"Row {i}: {row}")

    # Combine the rows back and decrypt to verify
    combined_encrypted = ''.join(encrypted_rows) # Combine the rows back
    decrypted_text = secret_password_row(combined_encrypted, -key, 1)[0]  # Decrypt back to single row
    print(f"The decryption result: {decrypted_text}") # Print the decrypted text
except ValueError as e:
    print(e)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Reverse Alphabet
# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏©‡∏≤‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏§‡∏©
def reverse_alphabet_encrypt(text):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')
            reversed_char = chr(shift_base + (25 - (ord(char) - shift_base)))
            result += reversed_char
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input contains invalid characters.")
    return result

try:
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Alphabet Only): ")

    # ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Reverse Alphabet
    ciphertext = reverse_alphabet_encrypt(plaintext)
    print("The encrypted ciphertext (Reverse Alphabet):", ciphertext)

    # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô
    decrypted_text = reverse_alphabet_encrypt(ciphertext)
    print(f'The decryption result: {decrypted_text}')
except ValueError as e:
    print(e)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ Caesar Cipher
def secret_password(text, key):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base)
            result += shifted_char
        elif char.isspace():  # Allow spaces between words
            result += char
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input contains invalid characters.")
    return result

try:
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Multiple lines allowed, Alphabet Only): ")
    key = int(input("Enter secret key (Number Only): "))

    ciphertext = '\n'.join(secret_password(line, key) for line in plaintext.split('\n'))
    print("The encrypted ciphertext (multi-line):")
    print(ciphertext)

    decrypted_text = '\n'.join(secret_password(line, -key) for line in ciphertext.split('\n'))
    print("The decryption result (multi-line):")
    print(decrypted_text)
except ValueError as e:
    print(e)

def secret_password(text, key):

    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base)

        else:

    decrypted_text = secret_password(reversed_decryption, -key) # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á key ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ key ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏∂‡πâ‡∏ô
import random

def secret_password(text, key):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a') # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏û‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏û‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏ç‡πà‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏•‡πá‡∏Å
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
            result += shifted_char # ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏£
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input non-characters.")
    return result

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ Caesar Cipher ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Base64 ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß
import base64

def secret_password(text, key):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a')
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base)
            result += shifted_char
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input contains invalid characters.")
    return result

try:
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Alphabet Only): ")
    key = int(input("Enter secret key (Number Only): "))

    # ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
    encrypted_text = secret_password(plaintext, key)
    
    # ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô Base64
    base64_encoded = base64.b64encode(encrypted_text.encode()).decode() # ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÑ‡∏õ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô Base64
    print("The encrypted ciphertext (Base64):", base64_encoded) # ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß

    # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å Base64 ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô
    base64_decoded = base64.b64decode(base64_encoded).decode() # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å Base64

    # ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ key ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏°
    decrypted_text = secret_password(base64_decoded, -key)
    print(f'The decryption result: {decrypted_text}')
except ValueError as e:
    print(e)

#‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏™‡∏±‡πà‡∏á import base64 ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏©‡∏≤ Python ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ô‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤ (import) ‡πÇ‡∏°‡∏î‡∏π‡∏• base64 ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Base64 ‡∏ã‡∏∂‡πà‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ó‡∏Ñ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏Ñ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏ö‡∏ï‡πå (binary) ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏° ASCII ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£
#Base64 ‡∏°‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÇ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÑ‡∏ö‡∏ï‡πå ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ô ‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏û‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ú‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏° (‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ô ‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå‡∏≠‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏•‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ HTTP requests) ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏° ASCII ‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™ Caesar Cipher ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡∏¢‡πå‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏à‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ï‡πá‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏ß‡∏Å‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏•‡∏ö
def secret_password(text, key):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha():  # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a') # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏û‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏û‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏ç‡πà‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏•‡πá‡∏Å
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
            result += shifted_char # ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏£
        elif char.isdigit():  # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            shifted_digit = (int(char) + key) % 10 # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
            result += str(shifted_digit) # ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏£
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input contains invalid characters.")
    return result

try:
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Alphabets and Digits Only): ")
    key = int(input("Enter secret key (Number Only): "))

    ciphertext = secret_password(plaintext, key)
    print("The encrypted ciphertext:", ciphertext)

    decrypted_text = secret_password(ciphertext, -key)
    print(f'The decryption result: {decrypted_text}')
except ValueError as e:
    print(e)

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏ó‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Caesar Cipher ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô 3 ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠
def secret_password(text, key, mode="normal"): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ Caesar Cipher
    result = ""
    for char in text: # ‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏•‡∏π‡∏õ‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°
        if char.isalpha(): # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            shift_base = ord('A') if char.isupper() else ord('a') # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏û‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏û‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏ç‡πà‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏•‡πá‡∏Å
            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
            if mode == "uppercase": # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
                shifted_char = shifted_char.upper() # ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏û‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏û‡πå‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏ç‡πà
            elif mode == "lowercase": # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô
                shifted_char = shifted_char.lower() # ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏û‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏û‡πå‡πÄ‡∏•‡πá‡∏Å
            result += shifted_char # ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó
        else:
            raise ValueError("Error!!!! Input non-characters.")
    return result

try:
    plaintext = input("Enter plaintext (Alphabet Only): ")
    key = int(input("Enter secret key (Number Only): "))
    mode = input("Choose mode (normal/uppercase/lowercase): ").strip().lower() # ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÇ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

except ValueError as e:

def is_valid_encrypted(text, key): # ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ñ‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà

        return True # ‡∏ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏™‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏à‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á

    result = ""

            shifted_char = chr((ord(char) - shift_base + key) % 26 + shift_base) # ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏´‡∏ô‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™

            result += shifted_char # ‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏£
        else:

# ‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Caesar Cipher ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ key ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™
def secret_password_with_mapping(text, key_mapping):
    result = ""
    for char in text:
        if char.isalpha(): # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà
            result += key_mapping.get(char, char)  # ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ key_mapping
        elif char.isspace(): # ‡∏™‡∏á‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
            result += char  # ‡∏™‡∏á‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á
        else:
            raise ValueError("‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î!!!! ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ô‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö")
    return result

        key_mapping[chr(ord('a') + i)] = chr((ord('a') + i - ord('a') + key) % 26 + ord('a')) # ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏û‡∏¥‡∏°‡∏û‡πå‡πÄ‡∏•‡πá‡∏Å

    ciphertext = secret_password_with_mapping(plaintext, key_mapping) # ‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏´‡∏±‡∏™‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°
